Your contacts

You will find contacts for specific queries by browsing the help topics above. Often you will not need to contact us at all as you can find answers online. However, there will be times you need to get in touch. Here are the details of the best people to contact.

For help with your module content, including assignments

  • Mr Sanjeev Gulev for DD101
  • Mr Kapil Dev for DD102
  • Mrs Margaret Jenkins for AA100

For administrative support and specialist advice

  • Social Sciences Student Support Team for BA Honours Social Policy and Criminolgy
  • Phone: 0290 157348
  • Mon - Fri 8:30 - 5:00
